alert.note: Alert for St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 9:18PM CDT until June 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN ST. CROIX COUNTY... At 917 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Richmond, or 20 miles northeast of River Falls, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Richmond, Glenwood City, Forest, Emerald, Cylon, Downing, Deer Park, Boardman, New Richmond Airport and Houlton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
